title: Budget Preparation Management Procedure (PIT-S130-0125) | Yönerge
text: Procedure No PIT-S130-0125V14 Effective Date 13-01-2012 Update Date 13-03-2025 Related Unit / Owner IT / Bilgi Teknolojileri Direktörü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Related Instruction Bilgi Teknolojileri İşlerini Yönetme Yönergesi (IIT-S130-01) Aim Plan the IT unit budget for the new calendar year in line with needs. Scope IT unit budget planning is within the scope of this procedure. Definitions / Abbreviations Implementation Steps Responsibility Outputs/Timing 1. Budget Preparations 1.1. Budget preparations for the next calendar year begin upon notification by the Financial Affairs Department. Financial Affairs Department Budget preparations beginning / Budget preparations begin date 1.2. The Fixed Asset, IT Services, and Consulting budgets are prepared as follows: • The Fixed Asset budget is determined in line with the requirements of infrastructure renewals, employee computer needs, student laptop packages, and new projects. • The IT Services and Lease budgets are prepared by considering newly launched and discontinued services during the current year, as well as services, software maintenance, and license updates that will be continued in the following year. • The Consulting budget is determined by considering the costs of projects to be implemented through outsourcing, based on the needs identified in accordance with the IT Resources Planning Instruction Letter (IIT-S110-01) IT Manager Fixed Assets, IT Services, Rent, and Fixed Assets budgets / By the delivery date of budget forms 1.3. Training and Travel budgets are determined based on employee training needs, domestic and international conference attendance, and HR training records are reviewed. IT Manager Training and Travel budgets / By the delivery date of budget forms 1.4. Small Fixed Asset and Consumables budgets are determined in line with user computer accessory requirements, printer cartridge, and toner consumption. IT Manager Small Fixed Assets and Consumables budgets / By the delivery date of budget forms 1.5. All budget plans created are submitted to the Finance Department. Following approval, expenditures are made in accordance with the IT Department's annual operating plan. IT Manager Submission of budget forms / By the delivery date of budget forms 2. Budget Usage and Control 2.1. 2.1. Budgets are used for the procurement of goods and services within the plans established by the IT Resources Planning Guideline (IIT-S110-01). These procurements are recorded at https://btdocs.sabanciuniv.edu/rapor/ . IT Manager Budget usage / During the year 2.2. Budget usage reports are reviewed twice a year, and the IT Director is informed of the usage status. IT Manager Budget usage control / June, September 2.3. Budgets are also monitored in real-time for purchases made throughout the year. If budget deviations are detected, the IT Director is notified.
